screen.name: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.title: AddOnManager
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 80) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 150 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (900 > wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,45 + offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,(1080-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 120) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 150 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (900 > wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,45 + offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,(1080-wsizey)/2))

skin.screen:
# fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing,currently there is no other way doing this.
{"templates": {"default":(95,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(10,12),size=(100,75),png=4),# index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,5),size=(1300,28),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=1),# index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,35),size=(930,28),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=5),# index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos=(120,65),size=(930,28),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=6),# index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos=(1070,35),size=(360,28),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=7),# index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos=(1070,65),size=(360,28),font=1,flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=8),# index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state":(95,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,5),size=(950,28),font=2,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=0),# index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos=(10,35),size=(950,60),font=3,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text=1),# index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts":[gFont("Regular",26),gFont("Regular",24),gFont("Regular",26),gFont("Regular",24) ],"itemHeight":95}
